title: Masking Recovery & Authenticity Restoration
description: A restorative routine for neurodivergent individuals recovering from masking exhaustion. Helps reconnect with authentic self, process social fatigue, and rebuild energy after suppressing neurodivergent traits.

setupSteps.question: What time do you typically finish social/work situations where you mask heavily?
What's your favorite way to stim or self-regulate when you're alone? (rocking, fidgeting, vocal stimming, movement, etc.)
What's a special interest or activity that feels purely 'you'?
What environment makes you feel most like yourself? (bedroom, specific room, outdoors, etc.)

steps.message: üé≠ Masking day complete. Time to let your authentic self breathe. You've earned this recovery time.
üè† IMMEDIATE RELIEF: Get to your ${authenticSpace} as quickly as possible. This is your decompression zone.
üëï PHYSICAL COMFORT: Change into your most comfortable clothes, remove anything restrictive (bras, shoes, jewelry, etc.)
üåä AUTHENTIC STIMMING: Engage in your ${authenticStimming} without any self-judgment. This is your nervous system healing.
üß† MENTAL PERMISSION: Remind yourself 'I don't have to perform anymore today. I can just BE.'
üé≠ Post-masking recovery time. Your authentic self is waiting.
üè† Retreat to ${authenticSpace} (your safe haven)
üëï Physical comfort ritual (comfortable clothes, remove restrictions)
üåä ${authenticStimming} session - your nervous system's natural regulation
üß† Permission to be authentic (no performance needed)
üíö AUTHENTICITY RECONNECTION: Engage with your ${authenticActivity} - something that feels purely, genuinely YOU.
üìù MASKING REFLECTION: Gently notice - what felt hardest about masking today? No judgment, just awareness.
üé≠ Full restoration protocol. Time to heal from masking and reconnect deeply with who you are.
üè† Sacred space activation (${authenticSpace})
üëï Complete comfort transformation
üåä Extended ${authenticStimming} - full nervous system reset
üß† Deep authenticity permission (you are enough as you are)
üíö Immersive ${authenticActivity} session - pure self-expression
üìù Masking awareness journaling (what patterns do you notice?)
üõ°Ô∏è SELF-ADVOCACY PLANNING: Identify one small way you could mask less tomorrow. What would feel safe to try?
üåü AFFIRMATION PRACTICE: 'My neurodivergent traits are not flaws to hide. They are part of my authentic self.'
üíé RESTORATION COMPLETE: You've honored your need for authenticity. Your true self is valuable and worthy of space in this world.

effect.message: üé≠ Masking Science: Suppressing your natural neurodivergent traits requires enormous energy. This recovery time isn't luxury - it's neurological necessity.
üåü You're learning to honor your authentic needs! Masking recovery is an act of self-respect. Ready to deepen your authenticity practice?
üéâ You're building a sustainable relationship with masking! You're learning when it's necessary and when you can be authentic. Ready for advanced self-advocacy?
üèÜ Two weeks of consistent masking recovery! You're developing a healthy relationship with authenticity and self-advocacy. This is profound healing work.
üí° Masking Reality: You're not 'too sensitive' or 'too much.' You're a neurodivergent person learning to balance authenticity with social navigation. Both are valid needs.

effect.taskDescription: Develop a 'Selective Masking Strategy' - identify situations where you can safely be more authentic vs. where masking is necessary for safety/goals
